name: 10mm Padded Skis Snowboard Bag with Wheels and TSA Combination Lock for Air Travel, 3 TPU Zippered Bags, Flexible Storage for Snowboards, Helmets, Snow Jackets & Boots, Waterproof
short_description: The Preface: As you race down the slopes, feeling the freedom, focusing on each move and forgetting your worries, or when you glide slowly, taking in the mountains, trees, and sky, enjoying the peace within, we hope our snowboard bag will be your trusted companion. Here’s what we’ve done to ensure that

Premium Protection: Made with a 3-layer shell of TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane), 10mm EPE padding, and 900D polyester with DWR (Durable Water Repellent) coating. Fits skis and snowboards from 140cm–173cm, keeping your board, boots, helmet, and gear safe from impact and wear

Flexible Storage Design: Comes with three removable TPU waterproof bags instead of fixed compartments, giving you the freedom to adjust space based on binding position. Additionally, three external zippered pockets provide convenient storage for smaller gears like gloves, scarves, and undergarments
TSA Combination Lock: Equipped with a TSA-approved lock for peace of mind during air travel. It secures your snowboard, ski boots, and goggles while making security checks faster and more convenient

Sturdy Bottom Structure: The rolling snowboard bag features a bottom made of rigid PVC material, coated with a protective film for enhanced scratch resistance. This durable design, combined with all-terrain wheels, prevents slipping on smooth surfaces, ensuring a more enjoyable journey

Multi-Functional Carry Options: Easily switch between rolling and backpack mode with hidden shoulder straps. Three reinforced handles provide multiple lifting choices, making it a reliable travel companion for every snow sports adventure

name: AUMTISC Snowboard Bag for Air Travel, Padded Snow Board Ski Bags with Ski Pole Gear Storage Pocket, Waterproof Snowboarding Bags with Shoulder Strap, Available Length in 156cm 166cm
short_description: Snow Board Bags Size: Measuring 167 x 18 x 33 cm, this snowboard travel bag can fit almost all snowboards up to 165 cm in length. Our snow board ski bag has plenty of space for your gear, including skis, a snowboard, helmets, jackets, gloves, goggles, and poles.

Full Padded Snowboard Bag: The skis snowboard bag is crafted from durable 600D polyester with thick padding and water-resistant inner lining to shield your gear from scratches, dings, and wet conditions during travel. Your snowboard arrives at the slopes in pristine condition, ready to ride.

Lockable Snowboarding Bag: Travel with confidence. Our ski bag is designed to protect your equipment at every stage. The switchable internal webbing cradles your single snowboard or double skis to prevent shifting. External buckle straps secure everything in place. When you're ready to check in your gear, simply lock the main compartment zipper. It provides total security for air, car, or train travel.

Snowboard Case with Storage Pocket: This snowboard bag for air travel features a front zippered pocket that's perfect for ski gloves, keys, and scarves. Inside, you'll find two dedicated ski pole pockets and a mesh compartment to keep all your small skiing essentials neatly stored. There's even a separate ID card pocket for quick and easy identification at baggage claim. Everything has its place so you can travel organized.

Easy to Carry: Our element equipment snowboard bag offers 3 ways to carry. Use the detachable padded shoulder strap for hands-free convenience, the reinforced top handle for quick lifting, or the side grip for better control. The ergonomic design takes the strain off your body - so hauling your gear through airports and parking lots feels effortless.
product_description: Protect your snowboard gear in style with our padded snowboard bag. Available in 156cm and 166cm lengths, it offers ample space for your snowboard, helmet, clothing, and accessories. The rugged, water-resistant 600D polyester shell ensures long-term use, while the adjustable shoulder strap and carrying handles make transportation a breeze. A large zip pocket provides easy access to your gear. Perfect for both snowboarding and skiing enthusiasts.

Both the interior and exterior are lined with waterproof material, ensuring your equipment stays dry and well-protected even in snowy or wet conditions. The widened zipper design allows for smooth and easy opening and closing.

【Great Capacity 】This Roller Padded Snowboard Bag can adjustable length 170cm~190cm(62.99 In~74.8 In) . Fits 2 snowboards/bindings, 2 pairs of boots((Up to US Size 13),ski poles, helmets, gloves, jackets, pants, goggles and so on.All you ski need!

【 Easy carry & Transport】 The ski travel bags for Air Travel,offers multiple carrying options, including rolling on wheels, single-shoulder carrying, and double-shoulder carrying, allowing you to easily switch between modes as needed. Furthermore, the integrated design makes it easy to travel between ski resorts and various locations such as airports, resorts, and hotels, facilitating convenient transportation.

name: Dakine Tour Snowboard Bag
short_description: 100% Polyester
DAKINE TOUR SNOWBOARD BAG When weight (and cash) is your highest concern, ditch the wheels but keep the features with the Tour Snowboard Bag.
Load up the main compartment with a board, pair of boots, and extra outerwear, then throw essential items like tuning kits in the exterior zippered pocket.

360-degree padding keeps hardgoods protected, while the removable padded shoulder strap and dual end handles make for easy transportation.
